thread.title: BRIEF-Tianjin Tianhai Investment's Shareholder Uses 0.89 Worth Of Shares As Collateral On Feb 7

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tianjin Tianhai Investment's Shareholder Uses 0.89 Worth Of Shares As Collateral On Feb 7

organizations.name: reuters) - tianjin tianhai investment co ltd

text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Tianjin Tianhai Investment Co Ltd :
* SAYS SHAREHOLDER USES 25.8 MILLION SHARES IN THE COMPANY, OR 0.89 PERCENT OF TOTAL ISSUED CAPITAL, AS COLLATERAL ON FEB 7
* SAYS SHARE TRADE REMAIN SUSPENDED AS ASSET RESTRUCTURING NEGOTIATION UNDERWAY Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2EcOkTy ; bit.ly/2nXkQSz Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
